name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. James TARRANT, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. James TARRANT, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The petition for allowance of appeal and the petition for allowance of appeal nunc pro tunc are hereby denied. The request of Methuselah Z.O. Bradley, IV, Esquire, to withdraw from further representation of Petitioner in this matter is granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
539 A.2d 785
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. James TARRANT, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 7, 1988.
